basic_information.scholarship_name: The McLaughlin Family Endowed Scholarship in Photography
basic_information.committee_name: CLA - Mass Comm The McLaughlin Family

description: This scholarship recognizes a student deemed extremely talented by their faculty who also plans on photography as their profession. Eligibility Requirements Minimum 3.5 GPA Photographic Arts major or minor Continuing student for fall semester that the scholarship is awarded

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
